title: 命令，发射火球！生成房屋！
author: 博中
txt_content:
本帖最后由 博中 于 2016-11-14 22:17 编辑 

本人刚刚来论坛，先发布个贴子版本 1.8.x
最近研究命令有一些成果，跟大家分享一下。（输入/give @a command_block来获得命令方块）
=====================================================================================
第一个是右键雪球发射火球（恶魂的火球），指令如下～～只要复制到命令方块里，激活一下就可以了～

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Time:1,Block:redstone_block,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~ ~-9 ~ air},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:give @a snowball 1 0 {display:{Name:右键发射火球}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-2 ~-2 ~ redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-2 ~ ~ command_block 0 {} {Command:setblock ~ ~-1 ~ redstone_block}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-1 ~ ~ command_block 0 {} {Command:execute @e[type=Snowball] ~ ~ ~ summon Fireball ~ ~ ~ {direction:[],ExplosionPower:7}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-2 ~ ~ command_block 0 {} {Command:setblock ~ ~1 ~ air}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~1 ~ ~1 ~6 ~ redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:redstone_block}}}}}}}}}}
=====================================================================================
第二个是生成房屋的指令，指令如下～
summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Time:1,Block:redstone_block,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~-1 ~-15 ~ ~ ~1 ~ air},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-17 ~1 torch},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~ ~-17 ~1 wooden_pressure_plate},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-16 ~1 bookshelf},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-15 ~-1 bed 10},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~1 ~-14 ~ bed 2},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~ ~-13 ~-1 furnace 3},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-1 ~-12 ~-1 crafting_table},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-1 ~-11 ~ chest 5},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~-1 ~-10 ~1 chest 5},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~ ~-8 ~2 wooden_door 11},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:setblock ~ ~-8 ~2 wooden_door 3},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~-8 ~2 ~-2 ~-8 ~-2 planks},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~3 ~-7 ~-2 ~3 ~-7 ~3 oak_stairs 1},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~-2 ~-6 ~-3 ~3 ~-6 ~-3 oak_stairs 2},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~-3 ~-5 ~2 ~-3 ~-5 ~-3 oak_stairs 0},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~2 ~ ~2 ~-2 ~-4 ~-2 glass 0 hollow},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~-3 ~-3 ~3 ~2 ~-3 ~3 oak_stairs 3},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~17 ~ redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Time:1,Block:redstone_block}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}
=====================================================================================
楼主还有很多东西不会，请多多指教~
求人气，金粒～～～～～～～

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
还不错，推荐用1.9+做起来方便很多……
顺便推荐懒癌卫士命令编辑生成器。

replies.author: MathBell
replies.txt_content: QAQ雪球的没看懂/单命令方块矿车够不够

replies.author: 博中
replies.txt_content:
MathBell 发表于 2016-11-14 17:47
QAQ雪球的没看懂/单命令方块矿车够不够
版本是1.8（1.9+不可以）用/give @a command_block来获得命令方块
上面写了一大串命令（类似代码），用Ctrl+C复制，Ctrl+v粘贴，把命令弄进命令方块里，旁边放红石块。就可以啦～
